document_data.caption: A map showing the Shee Pool on Gwynneth.
document_data.name: Shee Pool
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shee Pool''' was a small lake found on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The Shee Pool was located near the center of [[Myrloch Vale]]. It was fed from the northwest by the [[Deepglen Stream]] flowing down from the [[Black Mountains]]. The Deepglen Stream continued south to connect with the [[Myrloch]]. A branch of the [[Codsrun Creek]] exited the lake from its northeast shore.
document_data.Notable Locations: A [[Moonwell]] was located along the Shee Pool's northern shore.
